event.title: FSFE in FrOSCon in Sankt Augustin, Germany in Sankt Augustin, Deutschland

body.p: The FSFE will be present in the Free and Open Source Software Conference with a booth and a talk. Johannes N채der, FSFE Project Manager, will give a talk on "Free Software for German administrations? The 'Sovereign Workplace' conundrum" ("Freie Software f체r Deutschlands Verwaltungen? R채tsel um den 'Souver채nen Arbeitsplatz'"). This talk and most of the conference will be held in German. You do not need to buy a ticket, nor to register. Just drop by!
